title: Jon Bernthal
description:
Actor Jon Bernthal feels extraordinarily lucky about being Conan O’Brien’s friend.


 

Jon sits down with Conan to discuss his unique introduction to acting, the importance of discipline and well-roundedness, and speaking with life-without-parole inmates on his podcast Real Ones. Later, Conan recalls just a few of his greatest fighting victories.


 

Got a question for Conan? Call our voicemail: (323) 451-2821.


 

For Conan videos, tour dates and more visit TeamCoco.com.
author: conaf@teamcoco.com (Team Coco & Earwolf)
